Class BigTwo

  • java.lang.Object
    • BigTwo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardGame

    public class BigTwo
extends java.lang.Object
implements CardGame
    This class is used for modeling a Big Two card game. It provides the main logics for the game.
    Version:
    1.0 (Initial Release)
    Author:
    FAROOQI Muhammad Ali 3035393157

        public BigTwo()
        Public constructor. It creates a Big Two card game with four players and a Big Two Console.

      • getWinner

        public CardGamePlayer getWinner()
        Returns the winner of current game. Returns null if there is no winner;
        Returns:
        Winning player of class CardGamePlayer if the game has ended. Null otherwise.

      • setWinner

        public void setWinner(CardGamePlayer winner)
        Sets the winner of the game. This also marks the end of the current game.
        Parameters:
        winner: - Player, of class CardGamePlayer, who has won the game.

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(Hand currentHand)
        Checks if the move is valid. Valid move is any move after which the active player changes. It can be a pass, or any other legal move in Big Two.
        Parameters:
        currentHand - The current hand being played. Null if the player is passing his/her turn.
        Returns:
        True if the move is legal, and not passed; false otherwise.

      • start

        public void start(Deck deck)
        A method to start the Big Two game, and play it until the game is over.
        Specified by:
        start in interface CardGame
        Parameters:
        deck - a deck of shuffled cards of class BigTwoDeck.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for declaring, initializing and starting a new game with shuffled cards, and printing out the results after the game is over.
        Parameters:
        args - None required.

      • composeHand

        public static Hand composeHand(CardGamePlayer player,
                               CardList cards)
        Composes a legal hand from the provided card list. Can make the following legal combinations of hands: Single, Pair, Triple, Straight, Flush, FullHouse, Quad and StraighFlush.
        Parameters:
        player - the current player, of class CardGamePlayer, who has composed the hand.
        cards - the list of cards, of class CardList, of which the hand has to be made
        Returns:
        one of the legal combination of hand (of the highest order) possible from the given combination of cards. If no possible combination is there, it returns null.
